summary.span: 提供 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 與其他技術 (例如 Win32 API) 之間互通的支援類型，並且提供與 WPF 相關之其他特定互通案例的基底類別。

span.span: Provides supporting types for interoperation between Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) and other technologies such as Win32 APIs and provides base classes for other specific interoperation scenarios involving WPF.
